Title: Establishes the school safety specialist act
Summary: Establishes the school safety specialist act; establishes a certification and training program for school safety specialists; outlines the roles and duties of school safety specialists.
LawCode: Add ยง844, Exec L; add ยง2801-c, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the education law, in relation to establishing the school safety specialist act
